issue.title: osrf_msgs/JointCommands.h: No such file or directory

content.raw:
This is not a bug but rather a question for answers.gazebosim.org

I'm assuming that this error occurs while you're trying to compile drcsim - please follow the [install instructions on compiling from source](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/InstallDRC#Compiling_from_source), it explains all the dependencies that need to be installed (in your case ``osrf-common`` seems to be missing).
content.html:
